name: Butter Chicken
description: Savor the rich and creamy delight of our Butter Chicken, a classic dish featuring tender chicken simmered in a velvety tomato-based sauce. Perfectly spiced to tantalize your taste buds!

name: Paneer Chilli
description: Delight in the zesty and savory Paneer Chilli, featuring succulent paneer cubes tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. A perfect fusion of flavors to excite your palate!

name: Chicken Lollypop
description: Experience the bold and spicy flavors of Chicken 65, featuring crispy, marinated chicken pieces bursting with aromatic spices. A tantalizing treat for every spice lover!

name: Nalli Soup
description: Indulge in the hearty and flavorful Mutton Nalli Soup, a robust blend of tender mutton and aromatic spices. This nourishing soup promises warmth and comfort in every spoonful!

name: Chinese Noodles
description: Enjoy the savory and aromatic Chinese Noodles, a delightful mix of stir-fried noodles, fresh vegetables, and authentic spices. A satisfying dish that brings the essence of China to your plate!

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Relish the aromatic and flavorful Chicken Biryani, a perfect blend of tender chicken, fragrant basmati rice, and exotic spices. A timeless classic that promises a feast in every bite!
